hjb.jms
Class HJBConnectionFactory

java.lang.Object
  hjb.jms.HJBConnectionFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConnectionFactory
public class HJBConnectionFactory
extends Object
implements ConnectionFactory

HJBConnectionFactory decorates a ConnectionFactory, and adds extra methods that allow it access the connections it creates.

It provides:

  • a cache of the Connections created by the decorated ConnectionFactory
  • various utility methods that to the allow the connections to operated on via their creation index
  • a method that allows all connections to be shutdown

Author:
Tim Emiola
